department: Training and Learning Solutions Division, CBSA
description: The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to gather information on industry capabilities and availability of an Online Cloud-based Testing Web-Application that meets our current and future assessment needs.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement
================

**Tender Title**: AI-Powered Cloud-Based Online Testing Web-Application
------------------------

The Canada Border Services Agency's Training and Learning Solutions Division (TSLD) is seeking a secure and defensible automated testing web-application for the Officer Induction Training Program (OITP) at the CBSA College in Rigaud, Quebec.

**Tender Details**
----------------

- **Reference Number**: cb-922-92063170
- **Solicitation Number**: 1000433066
- **Publication Date**: 2023-10-19
- **Closing Date and Time**: 2023-11-03T14:00:00
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Requirements**
-------------

The selected solution must provide a secure and automated testing platform for the OITP program. The platform should enable the CBSA to manage and administer secure and defendable online assessments.

**Industry Consultation**
----------------------

The CBSA is seeking information from industry stakeholders regarding their capabilities and availability in providing a cloud-based online testing web-application that meets the agency's current and future assessment needs.

**Additional Information**
------------------------

- **Regions of Opportunity**: The tender is open to Canadian bidders.
- **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
- **Contracting Entity**: Canada Border Services Agency
- **Contact Information**: Yuqiao Hu, yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca, (343) 551-8763

**Document Attachments**
-----------------------

The tender documentation is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22589/rfi-1000433066---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22589/rfi-1000433066---en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22589/rfi-1000433066---fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22589/rfi-1000433066---fr.pdf
